ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that also, but only as a rumor. I know that ther is a skull you can carry around that enhances your stats (have only seen it on others), and i
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that also, but only as a rumor. I know that ther is a skull you can
carry around that enhances your stats (have only seen it on others), and i think
that's where the rumor comes from.

Jaqui(mith marr)
